name: Ocean Gleam Bracelet
description: A luminous bracelet featuring cascading silver waves and aquamarine crystals that shimmer with every movement.

name: Midnight Garden Bracelet
description: Dark floral charms and polished stones intertwine to create a bracelet that evokes a moonlit botanical garden.

name: Rose Dawn Bracelet
description: Warm blush tones and delicate metallic beads capture the soft glow of sunrise in a refined bracelet design.

name: Crystal Meadow Bracelet
description: Faceted stones in fresh green hues rest among silver petals for a bracelet inspired by a sparkling meadow.

name: Gilded Twilight Bracelet
description: Golden links and twilight stones blend together, offering a bracelet that balances elegance with everyday wear.

name: Starlit Cascade Earrings
description: Tiered crystal drops fall like stars across the night sky, bringing graceful movement to these earrings.

name: Celestial Hoop Earrings
description: Orbit-inspired hoops adorned with shimmering stones add a cosmic flair to any evening ensemble.

name: Blossom Whisper Earrings
description: Soft pastel petals crafted in lightweight metal make these earrings a delicate statement piece.

name: Aurora Fringe Earrings
description: Iridescent fringes swing effortlessly, reflecting hues of dawn for a vibrant ear-catching accessory.

name: Velvet Night Earrings
description: Deep jewel-toned stones and sleek metallic lines combine for an elegant pair suited to formal evenings.

name: Moonriver Necklace
description: A flowing silver chain adorned with luminous stones captures the gentle movement of moonlit water.

name: Auric Bloom Necklace
description: Golden floral motifs bloom along the chain, bringing radiant warmth to this necklace design.

name: Pearl Horizon Necklace
description: Graduated pearls are paired with sleek metallic accents to create a necklace that echoes a serene horizon.

name: Twilight Garland Necklace
description: Dusky gemstones nestle among winding metallic vines for a necklace inspired by twilight gardens.

name: Crystal Veil Necklace
description: A cascade of translucent crystals forms a luminous veil that drapes gracefully across the neckline.

name: Sunflare Necklace
description: Radiant amber stones burst from the center of this necklace, echoing the warmth of a summer sun.

name: Frosted Laurel Necklace
description: Silvered leaves edged with icy crystals wrap gently around the collar for an ethereal finish.

name: Starfall Tiara
description: Clusters of radiant crystals arc across the tiara, mimicking a shower of shooting stars.

name: Moonlit Petal Tiara
description: Gentle petal silhouettes and moonlit crystals crown the wearer with romantic sparkle.
